channel.title: Teleing others by cords

item.title: Teleing others by cords
item.dc:creator: @Corruptive Corruptive
item.description:
@Corruptive wrote:

Ok i attempted makig a code for this but didnt work out to well so im just gonna ask for help i want to be able to type a command and then the persons name and be able to send them to the cords I enter anyone got a code for this this is what i made up

if (command.startsWith("telejailcell1") && (playerRights >= 2)) { try{ String otherPName = command.substring(20); int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName); int newPosX = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(10, 14)); int newPosY = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(15, 19)); if(otherPIndex != -1) { client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex]; teleportToX = 3013; teleportToY = 3195; heightLevel = 0; updateRequired = true; // sendMessage("You were sent to jail by "+playerName); sendMessage("You have have teleportedl "+command.substring(20)); } else { sendMessage("The name doesnt exist."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Try entering a name you want to tele to you.."); } }[br][size=1]Posted on: June 21, 2007, 02:35:20 PM[/size][hr] = \ come on ppl at least read this lol

Read full topic
